About Disclaimer

About

With Quick, Font! you can try out fonts on your own website without having to download and install the font. It is similar to Google Fonts, except that I will never track your usage. All fonts are served directly from Github (although the stylesheets are passed through a proxy to ensure the correct Content-Type headers).

I also include non-free fonts here so that they can be trialled on your site. Please see the disclaimer!

Disclaimer

Many of these fonts are commercial - you have to pay if you want to use them beyond just testing them out. I take no responsibility or liability if you use these in a commercial project. I'm likely breaking some rules with this site, however I hope that the owners of the fonts will see this as free promotion and advertising. If you are an owner of one of these fonts and would like me to remove it, please open an issue. I do not earn anything from this site, it is simply a tool to make developing and prototyping much quicker.

Find your font.

Try out different fonts without the pain of downloading and installing.

Avenir

  • View
  • Use

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

A group of parrots is called a pandemonium. A group of porcupines is called a prickle. A group of crabs is called a consortium. A group of sharks is called a shiver.

License: Unknown
Load
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://combinatronics.com/kiwicopple/quick-font/master/css/avenir.css" />
Use
<style> p { font-family: 'Avenir'; } </style>
